verses.roman:
bhāva-śābalye punaḥ kailā pralapana
karṇāmṛta-ślokera artha kailā vivaraṇa

synonyms: bhāva-śābalye—from the aggregate of all ecstatic emotions; punaḥ—again; kailā pralapana—He talked like a madman; karṇāmṛta-ślokera—of a verse from Kṛṣṇa-karṇāmṛta; artha—the meaning; kailā vivaraṇa—described in detail.
translation: Due to the conjunction of various ecstatic emotions, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu again began speaking like a madman and described in detail the meaning of a verse from Kṛṣṇa-karṇāmṛta.
